revision.comment: Correct CPU speed. The TS-219P+ is 1.6GHz while the TS-219P is 1.2GHz
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=QNAP |model=TS-219 |revision=P+ |asin=B004BD66OQ |newegg=N82E16822107053 |price=359 |est_release_date=11/2010 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=NAS enclosure |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, fan, eSATA, heatsink, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=M25P28V6P |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ1G83TFR-H9C |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA II, eSATA, |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=4 |jtag=yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, JP1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CN2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, System Controller IC;Microchip;PIC16F690;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, PCI Express to SATA II Host Controller;JMicron;JMB362;;1;,,, Wide Input Voltage Synchronous Buck Converter;ON Semi;NCP3101C;;1;,,, Dual 3A, Step-Down DC/DC Switching Regulator;ON Semi;NCP3121;;1;,,, P-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4435GM;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Voltage Regulator;GlobalTech;GS1117AX;;1;,,, 20V Dual P-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si9933CDY;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware=Debian |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:08:9B }} {{TagLine|2-Bay All-in-one NAS server with iSCSI}} :[https://www.qnap.com/en/product/ts-219p+ Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://www.qnap.com/en/download?model=ts-219p%2B&category=firmware Download Center]
